turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to place an order at a new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one of them to be barbecue chicken, another to be a pepperoni and pineapple, the third to be mushroom and ham, and the fourth to be no cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any other toppings on your no cheese pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just mayonnaise red sauce mayonnaise sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any other requests for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want all of them to have gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 4 medium gluten free pizzas, 1 bbq chicken, 1 pepperoni and pineapple, 1 mushroom and ham, and one with no cheese just marinara sauce, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and will you be dining in, picking up or having your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be picking up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas should be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you, just show it at the counter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
